description:
As a library system user
  I want to access the book list with proper authorization
  So that I can view books securely

elements.name: Authorized user can view books when books exist

steps.name: the system is running
I am logged in as "user" user
there are books in the system
I send GET request to "/api/books"
the response status should be 200
the response should contain the list of books

elements.name: Authorized user sees empty list when no books exist

steps.name: the system is running
I am logged in as "user" user
there are no books in the system
I send GET request to "/api/books"
the response status should be 200
the response should contain an empty list

elements.name: Unauthorized user cannot access books when books exist

steps.name: the system is running
I am not authenticated
there are books in the system
I send GET request to "/api/books"
the response status should be 401

elements.name: Unauthorized user cannot access books when no books exist

steps.name: the system is running
I am not authenticated
there are no books in the system
I send GET request to "/api/books"
the response status should be 401

name: Book API Access Control

description:
As a library system user
  I want to retrieve book information by ID
  So that I can view specific book details

elements.name: Successfully retrieve a book with valid ID

steps.name: I am authenticated as "admin" for getBookByID
I send a GET request to "/api/books/1" for getBookByID
the response status code should be 200 for getBookByID
the response should contain the correct book details for getBookByID

elements.name: Attempt to retrieve non-existent book

steps.name: I am authenticated as "admin" for getBookByID
I send a GET request to "/api/books/99999" for getBookByID
the response status code should be 404 for getBookByID

elements.name: Attempt to access book without authentication

steps.name: I am not authenticated for getBookByID
I send a GET request to "/api/books/1" without authentication for getBookByID
the response status code should be 401 for getBookByID

elements.name: User role can access book details

steps.name: I am authenticated as "user" for getBookByID
I send a GET request to "/api/books/1" for getBookByID
the response status code should be 200 for getBookByID
the response should contain the correct book details for getBookByID

name: Get Book by ID API

elements.name: Update a book with valid data

steps.name: I have an existing book
I update the book with new valid data
I should get a status code of 200

elements.name: Update a non-existing book

steps.name: I have an invalid book ID
I try to update the non-existing book
I should get a status code of 404

elements.name: Update a book with missing title

steps.name: I have an existing book
I update the book without title
I should get a status code of 400

elements.name: Update a book with missing author

steps.name: I have an existing book
I update the book without author
I should get a status code of 400

elements.name: Update a book with unauthorized user

steps.name: I have an existing book
I have invalid credentials
I try to update the book
I should get a status code of 401
